content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 2, Valencia 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 2, Valencia 1.
Offside, Barcelona. Maxwell tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Barcelona) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Gerard Piqué.

Substitution, Valencia. Vicente replaces Jeremy Mathieu.
